channel.title: Hezekiah's Web Site
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on Hezekiah's Web Site

item.title: Links
item.description:
Links to various sites and resources around the internet. All of these pages are things I find intersting and are worth looking at. Inclusion ≠ Ideological Endorsement, obviously.

Personal Websites & Blogs

  • lukesmith.xyz
  • マリウス (Marius)
  • Hugo Landau
  • meyerweb • Website and blog of Web legend Eric Meyer.
  • Koshka’s Kingdom
  • ribo.zone • A very cool piece of web design.
  • ELDRITCHDATA • Linux and privacy site best known for blocking browsers that have javascript enabled (insert gigachad.jpg here).

Publications

  • Low←Tech Magazine • Solar-powered website that questions the modern world’s obsession with technological progress. Looks for low-tech solutions to high-tech problems. Project of Kris de Decker.

Software

  • LibreWolf • Build of Firefox with Mozilla trackers and bloat removed and better default settings.
  • Hugo • The Static Site Generator I use for this website.
  • ungoogled-chromium • Build of Chromium with Google services and trackers removed.
  • SDR++ • SDR++ is a cross-platform and open source SDR (Software Defined Radio) software with the aim of being bloat free and simple to use.
  • Karabiner-Elements • Powerful key remapper for MacOS X. Public Domain software.

Webrings & Clubs

  • The Guild of Heaven Tree • Luke Smith-coded Christian webring.
  • 1MB Club • A selection of webpages under 1 MB.
  • 512KB Club • A selection of webpages under 512 KB.
  • 250KB Club • A selection of webpages under 256 KB.
  • No-JS Club • A selection of webpages that do not use javascript.
  • No CSS Club • A selection of webpages that do not use CSS.
  • No HTML Club • A selection of webpages that do not use HTML (yes, really).

Fun

  • The last page of the internet • For when you just want to skip to the ending.
  • Excuse of the Day • Injecting daily palliations directly into your veins since the ’90s.

Unsorted

  • Marginalia Search
  • Wiby Search
  • Make the Web Great Again
  • LandChad.net
  • LindyPress.net
  • Not Related!

item.title: Contact Me
item.description:
< my first name > [at] hunicke.com

My preferred method of contact is email.

I generally avoid using social media. However, I do have profiles on the following:

  • GitHub / HezekiahHunicke
  • LinkedIn / HezekiahHunicke
  • Discord / HezekiahHunicke

item.title: About this Website
item.description:
Resources I Used

The font used in my site banner is Jacquard 24 by Sarah Cadigan-Fried. It is provided under the Open Font License. Sarah has made several ornamental pixel-type fonts, which, interestingly enough, are actually designed for knitting. They are all available on her GitHub profile linked below:

  • Sarah Cadigan-Fried’s GitHub profile
  • License for Jacquard
  • The repository for Jacquard on GitHub

For the patterned backgrounds on this site I have used heropatterns.com by Steve Schoger, a very cool resource for customizable, SVG-based repeating patterns. They are provided under a Creative Commons attribution license.

Building this Site

This site is built using Hugo, billed as a fast and flexible static-site generator (SSG) written in Go. You can learn more about Hugo at gohugo.io. My Hugo theme is adapted from lugo by Luke Smith. You need a theme to get started with Hugo, and lugo is a very minimal sort of tutorial theme that has enough to get you going while still being easy to rewrite to meet your needs. See Luke’s Hugo tutorial on YouTube.

Hosting

This site is hosted on GitHub Pages, arguably the best (least limited) free static site host.
